AuthorDetails.Name: MrFreeze
AuthorDetails.Description: Eric paints warhammer miniatures and have a passion for coding. He is primarily a front-end developer but also dabbles in back-end development. Works at Umbraco HQ

Description: A package that gives you a property editor for Geo Coordinates.

Screenshots.Caption: Umbraco Geolocation Coordinates Property Editor with validation
Backoffice map view, with click to place pins and use current location
Geo Coordinates property settings, to toggle map, set default value and height

Title: Umbraco Geolocation Coordinates
